short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Overrides the new tab page with a starfield that changes your perception as you move the mouse.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Turns your New Tab page into a Starfield that you can move around inside with your mouse!

Now with Planets!

Press Shift + M to hide/show the mouse.
